title: $:/litClock/times/-20:20-Mark Haddon
quoteSourceTitle: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time

title: $:/litClock/times/-20:20-Alistair MacLean
quote_last: all ships had completed oiling. Hove to, they had had the utmost difficulty in keeping position in that great wind; but they were infinitely safer than in the open sea

title: $:/litClock/times/-20:20-George and Weedon Grossmith
quote_first: Knowing that the dinner was only for us six, we never dreamed it would be a full dress affair. I had no appetite. It was quite
quote_last: before we sat down to dinner.
